1.0.1.en: Add nicer images and beter description

1.0.2.en: Add more info like start-up counter and remove fan_speed when using virtual remotes

1.0.3.en: Add support for Homey Pro 2019 and manual pairing

1.0.5.en: Add tooltips and description in settings and pairing

1.0.6.en: Add new setting Virtual Remote Type and based on model you get the right Fan Modus options

1.0.7.en: Bugfix: You can now use authentication webapi

1.0.8.en: Add support for WebAPI v2 (Beta firmware)

1.0.9.en: Fixing manual adding device with username and password authentication
